title: Stylist
summaries: The Stylist is an NPC vendor who can change the player's hairstyle and hair color. She also sells a variety of Hair Dyes, which apply dynamic effects to the player's hair. She will move in once the following criteria have been met:

• There is an available vacant house.
  • Rescuing her as the Webbed Stylist, who can be encountered randomly in Spider Nests in the Cavern layer. Interacting with her in this state with âš· Open / Activate will free her. If the Webbed Stylist is killed, she will still be able to respawn afterwards; if the Stylist NPC is killed, she will move in again after some time as long as there are vacant houses.

Hair Dyes range in price from 5 GC to 30 GC. Switching to another normal hairstyle (styles #1 through #51 only) costs 2 GC (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 1 GC (Old-gen console version), while any other hairstyles (including all Stylist-exclusive hairstyles) cost 20 GC (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 5 GC (Old-gen console version); changing hair color costs 2 GC (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 1 GC (Old-gen console version).

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Stylist's prices can vary depending on her Happiness; this also affects her prices for hairstyle and/or color changes, as follows: The total cost of the chosen hairstyle and/or hair color change is multiplied by her happiness-based price multiplier, and then rounded to the nearest multiple of 1 GC. Thus, the cost of changing hairstyles can be 2 GC - 3 GC (for basic styles) or 15 GC - 30 GC (for expensive styles); changing hair colors can range from 2 GC - 3 GC; and changing both hairstyle and hair color can range from 3 GC to 33 GC.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked> when confronted by enemies, the Stylist will use <linked>Stylish Scissors</linked> to defend herself, dealing 10 / <linked>15</linked> / <linked>17</linked> damage at the start of the game, and (on the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>) as players progress she will gain <linked>various stat increases</linked>. She may also drop them upon death. Note that she can only defend herself once freed, not while still webbed.
The Webbed Stylist is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades.
